title: How can scientists still be discovering new parts of the human brain? - Quora

response.answer_text: The article indicates this isn't new to science. What it says is: Research had an hypothesis about what previously described region does.Research does not show similar things in non-profit human primates.So it's not like finding a new continent on the globe. More like finding a good use for a user trick on an Android phone that was always there, but isn't on an iPhone.

“Discovered new parts of the human brain” is the sales part of the report. What happened is that people discovered more about the way fine motor control works and pinpointed the particular location where that activity is centered. Brains are complex. We will be learning more about how the brain works for a while yet.
